overview: A documentary about a very different school, a Te-Arte, which teaches children in a playful way, with games, without separating ages, and in contact with nature and animals. Its creator is Thereza Soares Pagani, who lives at school as her main life goal, and teaches appreciation of childhood. At school, children learn with art, literature, music and popular Brazilian culture.
title: Sementes do Nosso Quintal
